EXPERIENCE
Regional Development Manager - Scotland     
SGS United Kingdom Limited Glasgow  
UKAS ISO accredited Certiﬁcation, QHSE Training  & Compliance Solutions  
Brought in to drive new business in Scotland - securing over £400,000  
in new contracts in Scotland and Key Accounts United Kingdom  
Introduced Cross Selling initiative to drive sales and engage sales  
teams from diﬀerent divisions for the complete integrated sale                
Diploma in Sales Management 24th May 2020
Business Development Specialist - Retail Sector 
Bureau Veritas Birmingham
UKAS ISO accredited Certiﬁcation, QHSE Training     
Brought in to drive new business in the retail sector team securing  
over 300k in new contracts for safety support here in the United  
Kingdom and throughout Europe, the Middle East and the Nordics
Made such a name for myself in ten months that I was head hunted to  
work for competitor SGS in Scottish Region  
Sales Director 
Green Cross Training Milton Keynes
Providing innovative Health and Safety Training & Tangible Safety  
Equipment United Kingdom wide  
I managing sales operation including sales team both internal and  
external, the complete P&L, both product & new business growth
New Business included the winning bid for a large telecommunication  
company to the value of £120,000 for deﬁbrillators
Introduced and managed IOSH and NEBOSH new product lines to the  
organisation with new revenue streams totally over £200,000
Responsible for adherence to IOSH and NEBOSH Course Procedure,  
obtained 99.6% from the IOSH lead auditor for the systems and  
processes I implemented for these new service lines
Left to work in a specialist sales role selling for large TIC company  
working for an ex colleague from Connaught days   SUMMARY
First class and experienced high achieving sales  
leader for both team and account management,  
with a demonstrated history within the training  
and TIC industry. Highly skilled in coaching,  
targets - budgets both achieving and forecasting,  
cross selling, negotiation, tendering, customer  
care and training delivery.  
 
Expert in business to business, retail, hospitality   
and educational institutes for delivering and  
selling both non and tangible safety training,  
certiﬁcation and compliance solutions. A  
passionate safety professional with a NEBOSH  
General Certiﬁcate and Technical IOSH  
membership along with CPD development.  
 
A ﬁrst class sales leader who holds a Diploma in  
Sales Management achieved in his own time on  
line, May 2020.  Tack International, Miller  
Heiman Sales Management and SPIN training  
qualiﬁed who is always learning to maintain  
Tech IOSH status. Drives safety internally also.        
DAY IN THE LIFE OF ANDY
Selling  - Team and Personally  
Reporting Budget KPI's CRM New Bids   
Joint Customer Visits for New and Existing  
developing opportunities and staﬀ  
Creative Time - Innovation - What else can  
we sell to our customer base or New base
Building Positive authentic working  
relationships

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
